subject: Central Bank of Uganda
body:
Central Bank of Uganda
37/45, Plot 17/19 Kampala Road, Kampala
Attention Please
In respect of your fund inheritance payment US$2.000.000.000.00 Billion US Dollars, we the Central Bank of Uganda, head office will delivery your a new (2023) ATM VISA CARD that will accumulate your total funds of US$2 Billion USD according to the instruction from our creditor department here in the bank Today After the board of directors meeting held few days ago the total payment was approved for payment to you in new ATM VISA CARD which you must use to make withdraw of your fund in any ATM slotting machine around the world with maximum amount of $10,000 USD in daily payment until you cash the total payment of US$2 Billion USD credited in your ATM account.
And 
you have to send the required fee of $100.00 USD Itunes card or steam wallet card request for obtain the Affidavit of claim Ownership in your transaction with government of your fund origin been Federal Justice Republic of uganda
 ,the World Power Monetary Fund Investigation Union head office in Uganda  will declare your payment free from any money laundry and terrorism drug money sponsor activities to enable our service have the authority of release the payment to you and register it with SKYNET WORLDWIDE EXPRESS UGANDA LTD for over-night delivery to your address without delay. And here is information to send the fee to them or send Itunes card Steam wallet card because all modality has already been worked out even before you were contacted and noted;Also all we request from you is to follow our instruction so we can deliver your ATM parcel to your address today. Send the $100.00 USD Itunes card or send it from Western Union Ria buy Steam Wallet card and  ITUNES CARD as list following to enable them release the document today.
RECEIVER'S: NANONO SUZAN
COUNTRY : Uganda,Kampala
ADDRESS  
laza G07 Ci, PLOT 24/26 KAMPALA ROAD, Kampala
CITY:  Kampala
TEXT QUESTION: GOD WITH?
TEXT ANSWER: US
AMOUNT $100
OR BUY ITUNES CARD  $100 SEND US SCAN PICTURE AND CODE..............
Send the payment $100.00 through Ria Western union or buy a Steam wallet card Or Itunes card $100.00 send (Pin code
and picture here...
Reconfirm the following information to Receiving the ATM VISA CARD
US$2.000.000.000.00 Billion US Dollars
Your Name:
Address:
Mobile phone:
Direct phone number:
Send us an Itunes card or the MTCN Control Numbers or Ria reference number once you make the payment so we can direct it to the right office imposition to release the document. And immediately you make the payment to them the document will sign and your ATM parcel will deliver to your address without delay.
Robert Nkojo
Chief Finance Oficer.
Email: 
centralbankofuganda@motas.com.ar
 or  
authorizationofficial@gmail.com
.

subject: Re: Central Bank of Uganda
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided regarding my fund payment. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

1. Can you please provide more details about the Central Bank of Uganda and its role in this transaction?
2. What is the purpose of the required fee for obtaining the Affidavit of claim Ownership? How does it ensure that my payment is free from any illegal activities?
3. Could you explain how the ATM VISA CARD works and how I can access my funds using it?
4. Is there any specific reason why I need to send an iTunes card or Steam wallet card as payment? Are there alternative methods available?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Lucia

subject: Attention Lucia
body:
*[image: image.png]*



*Central Bank of Uganda37/45, Plot 17/19 Kampala Road, Kampalayour payment
code: 7599100*

*Attention   Lucia*

*I got your email and also noted: you will receive your compensation as
soon as possible, you have to make your choice to receive your compensation
funds via Telegraphic Online Banking or ATM Card package. Y**ou will
receive your ATM card package from  the Skynet Global Delivery Company and
I have made arrangement with Skynet Global Delivery Company chairman stated
that we have to provide your airport Yellow Tag  and Clearance Certificates
which will cost you US$500.00 only and while the Telegraphic Online Banking
will cost US$300.00 only and Bank to bank Transfer will cost you US$250.00
only.*

*You have to make your choice now and get back to me immediately, if you
choose an ATM Card, know that it will be delivered to your doorstep within
the next 72 hours and while you will receive your  Telegraphic Online
Banking login details within the next two working hours, please comply
now. ** You have to send the fees via western union,money gram or RIA, we
can accept bitcoin wallet if possible.*






*RECEIVER'S:  WAKIRO MARIAMCOUNTRY : Uganda,KampalaADDRESS  :Plaza G07 Ci,
PLOT 24/26 KAMPALA ROAD, KampalaCITY:  KampalaTEXT QUESTION: GOD WITH?TEXT
ANSWER: US*





*or send it via Mobile Money below:Number +256 702 913 960Name : Mariam
WakiroNetwork: Airtel*
*Country: Uganda*

*Send us the payment slip as soon as possible.*

*Best Regards*

*Dr. Michael Atingi-Ego, governor and deputy governor of the Bank of Uganda*
*Phone: +256 702 913 960.*

*Email:  authorizationofficial@gmail.com <authorizationofficial@gmail.com>*

subject: Re: Attention Lucia
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response. I have a few questions regarding the options you mentioned.

1. For the ATM Card package, could you please provide more details about how it works? How long does it usually take for the card to be delivered?

2. Regarding the Online Banking option, what are the benefits of choosing this method? Are there any specific requirements or documents needed to set up an online banking account?

3. If I choose Bank to Bank Transfer, could you please explain the process and any associated fees involved?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Lucia

subject: Attention Lucia
body:
*[image: image.png]*



*Central Bank of Uganda37/45, Plot 17/19 Kampala Road, Kampalayour payment
code: 7599100*

*Attention   Lucia*






*1. For the ATM Card package, could you please provide more details about
how it works? How long does it usually take for the card to be delivered?
(you shall receive your ATM card package within the next 72 hours after
payment)2. Regarding the Online Banking option, what are the benefits of
choosing this method? Are there any specific requirements or documents
needed to set up an online banking account? you will receive your
Telegraphic online banking system login details within the next few hours,
the  Telegraphic online banking system will be opened on your name after
you send the required charged fees.)3. If I choose Bank to Bank Transfer,
could you please explain the process and any associated fees involved? (we
will onle your bank details to enable us to transfer your total funds into
your nominated bank account within the two hours after we received the
fees.)*

*Best Regards*

*Dr. Michael Atingi-Ego, governor and deputy governor of the Bank of Uganda*
*Phone: +256 702 913 960.*

*Email:  authorizationofficial@gmail.com <authorizationofficial@gmail.com>*

subject: Re: Attention Lucia
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your willingness to provide more information about the ATM Card package and the different options available. I have a few follow-up questions regarding each option:

1. For the ATM Card package, you mentioned that it will be delivered within the next few hours after payment. Could you please clarify how the payment process works? Is it done online or through a bank transfer?

2. Regarding the Online Banking option, what are some of the benefits of choosing this method? Are there any specific documents or requirements needed to set up an online banking account?

3. If I choose Bank to Bank Transfer, could you explain the process in more detail? Are there any associated fees involved, and if so, what are they?

I look forward to hearing back from you with more details.

Best wishes,
Lucia

subject: Re: Attention Lucia'
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your willingness to provide information about the payment process for the ATM Card package. I just have a few follow-up questions regarding the different options available.

Firstly, if I choose the online banking option, what are some of the benefits that come with it? Are there any specific documents or requirements needed to set up an online banking account?

subject: Re: Attention Lucia
body:
Hello Lucia,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your interest in sharing information about online banking options. I'm always open to learning more about different services and their benefits.

Regarding the benefits of online banking, could you please elaborate on some specific advantages that come with it? I would like to understand how it can make banking more convenient and efficient for customers.

Additionally, you mentioned that no documents are needed if one opts for Bank to Bank Transfer. Could you please provide more details on how this process works? It would be helpful to know the steps involved and any requirements that need to be fulfilled.

Lastly, I'm curious about any associated fees with online banking. If there are fees involved, could you please let me know what they are? Understanding the costs is an important factor when considering different banking options.

Thank you again for reaching out, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lucia

subject: Re: Attention Lucia,comply now!
body:
Hello Dr. Michael,

Thank you for your email and providing me with the details regarding the fees for the ATM Card package delivery. I appreciate your prompt response.

I have a few questions before proceeding with the payment. Could you please clarify what the Airport Yellow Tag and Clearance fees are for? Additionally, could you explain what the Funds fees and consultant fee entail?

Furthermore, I noticed that you mentioned accepting payment via Western Gram or RIA. Are these the only options available, or can I use other methods such as bank transfer?

Thank you once again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Lucia
